mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Bisbee, William H. to Bolles, William M.; Paxton, Francis M.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bisbee, William H.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Col Bolles or Paxton care Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Sept 6 1861. By Telegraph from Marietta 6 1861. Hamilton reports his company ready to move on Monday answer him in regard to transportation he is at Hamden Bisbee 19HW86pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Bisbee, William H.
Marietta, Ohio
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Bolles, William M.; Paxton, Francis M.
